name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cornell GALLOWAY, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cornell GALLOWAY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Lancaster County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Penn B. Glazier, Lancaster, for appellant.
Edward F. Browne, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 503
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cornell GALLOWAY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Penn B. Glazier, Lancaster, for appellant.
Edward F. Browne, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
